title: Establishes additional state aid to certain merged public library systems
summary: Creates additional state aid for public library systems which merge after January 1, 2012; provides formulas for increased aid based upon the number of library systems which result from mergers and the expanded geographic areas to be served by merged systems; requires a report on the impact of the merger.

       Introduced  by M. of A. PRETLOW -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Libraries and Education Technology

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to additional  state  aid
         to public library systems merged after January 1, 2008

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of  section  273  of  the  education  law  is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph o to read as follows:
    3    O. (1) A MERGED PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM SHALL RECEIVE SUPPLEMENTAL STATE
    4  AID  MULTIPLIED  BY  A FACTOR EQUAL TO THE NUMBER OF PREVIOUSLY EXISTING
    5  PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEMS MINUS THE NUMBER OF MERGED LIBRARY SYSTEMS.    IF
    6  MORE  THAN  ONE  MERGED  PUBLIC  LIBRARY SYSTEM RESULTS FROM MERGING, OR
    7  MERGING AND RECONFIGURING  THREE  OR  MORE  PREVIOUSLY  EXISTING  PUBLIC
    8  LIBRARY  SYSTEMS, THE MERGED SYSTEMS SHALL DIVIDE THE SUPPLEMENTAL STATE
    9  AID.
   10    (2) A MERGED PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM MAY DESIGNATE ONE  CENTRAL  LIBRARY
   11  OR  CO-CENTRAL LIBRARIES IN ITS PLAN OF LIBRARY SERVICE SUBMITTED PURSU-
   12  ANT TO THIS SUBDIVISION. FORTY PERCENT OF THE  ANNUAL  SUPPLEMENTAL  AID
   13  RECEIVED  BY  THE  MERGED  PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM SHALL BE DESIGNATED FOR
   14  CENTRAL LIBRARY SERVICES. IF CO-CENTRAL LIBRARIES  ARE  DESIGNATED,  THE
   15  MERGED PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM SHALL DETERMINE THE PROPORTION OF STATE AID
   16  TO BE ASSIGNED TO EACH.
   17    (3)  ON  OR  BEFORE MARCH FIRST OF THE THIRD YEAR FOLLOWING MERGER, OR
   18  MERGER AND RECONFIGURATION, A MERGED PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM SHALL  REPORT
   19  TO  THE  COMMISSIONER  IN A FORM PRESCRIBED BY HIM OR HER ON THE SAVINGS
   20  ACHIEVED BY AND THE IMPACT UPON SERVICE DELIVERY OF  THE  MERGER.    THE
   21  COMMISSIONER  SHALL IN TURN TRANSMIT SUCH REPORT TO THE TEMPORARY PRESI-
   22  DENT OF THE SENATE AND THE SPEAKER OF THE ASSEMBLY.
   23    (4) FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS PARAGRAPH:
   24    (I) "MERGED PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM" SHALL MEAN A PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM:

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02408-01-1

       A. 2427                             2

    1    (A) CREATED AFTER JANUARY FIRST, TWO THOUSAND TWELVE  BY  MERGING,  OR
    2  MERGING  AND  RECONFIGURING  THE  AREAS SERVED BY TWO OR MORE PREVIOUSLY
    3  EXISTING PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEMS;
    4    (B)  MEETING  THE  CONDITIONS  UNDER  WHICH PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEMS ARE
    5  ENTITLED TO STATE AID AS SET FORTH IN SECTION TWO HUNDRED SEVENTY-TWO OF
    6  THIS PART; AND
    7    (C) RESULTING IN A LARGER GEOGRAPHIC AREA OR LARGER POPULATION  SERVED
    8  THAN THE PRIOR EXISTING SYSTEMS AND RESULTING IN A DECREASE IN THE TOTAL
    9  NUMBER  OF  PUBLIC  LIBRARY  SYSTEMS  ELIGIBLE FOR STATE AID PURSUANT TO
   10  SECTION TWO HUNDRED SEVENTY-TWO OF THIS PART.
   11    (II) "PREVIOUSLY EXISTING PUBLIC LIBRARY SYSTEM" SHALL MEAN  A  PUBLIC
   12  LIBRARY  SYSTEM  PROVIDING  SERVICE  UNDER  AN  APPROVED PLAN ON JANUARY
   13  FIRST, TWO THOUSAND TWELVE.
   14    (III) "SUPPLEMENTAL STATE AID" SHALL MEAN STATE AID,  IN  ADDITION  TO
   15  ANY OTHER STATE AID.  THE AMOUNT OF SUCH SUPPLEMENTAL STATE AID SHALL BE
   16  TWO  HUNDRED  FIFTY-FIVE  THOUSAND  DOLLARS  ANNUALLY FOR THE FIRST FIVE
   17  YEARS SUBSEQUENT TO MERGING, TWO HUNDRED FOUR THOUSAND  DOLLARS  IN  THE
   18  SIXTH  YEAR,  ONE  HUNDRED  FIFTY-THREE  THOUSAND DOLLARS IN THE SEVENTH
   19  YEAR, ONE HUNDRED TWO THOUSAND DOLLARS IN  THE  EIGHTH  YEAR,  FIFTY-ONE
   20  THOUSAND  DOLLARS IN THE NINTH YEAR, AND THEREAFTER SUCH AID SHALL CEASE
   21  TO BE PAID.
   22    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to additional state aid to public library systems merged after January 1, 2008
